plot: What is passion? What is obsession? How can life can be given? "El naranjo" tells the story of a painter and his desire for one of his creations, everything changes when his painting becomes alive.
title: El naranjo
plot_es: What is passion? What is obsession? How can life can be given? "El naranjo" tells the story of a painter and his desire for one of his creations, everything changes when his painting becomes alive.
plot_en: What is passion? What is obsession? How can life can be given? "El naranjo" tells the story of a painter and his desire for one of his creations, everything changes when his painting becomes alive.
